paragraph: Francis Hime (Rio de Janeiro, August 31, 1939) is a Brazilian composer, arranger, pianist and singer. He is the composer of the jazz standard Minha / All Mine, recorded, among others, by Bill Evans, Tony Bennett and Eliane Elias.
2000 – Sinfonia do Rio de Janeiro de São Sebastião
2001 – Sinfonia do Rio de Janeiro de São Sebastião – DVD
